languages.text: {n}Абеляр издает приглушенное недовольное ворчание. Его голос слышен только вам:{/n} ""Отбейте для меня"... Досточтимый Лорд-инквизитор уже даже не притворяется, соблюдая политес и заворачивая приказы в оболочку из просьб..."

{n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."
languages.original_text: {n}Абеляр издает приглушенное недовольное ворчание. Его голос слышен только вам:{/n} ""Отбейте для меня"... Досточтимый Лорд-инквизитор уже даже не притворяется, соблюдая политес и заворачивая приказы в оболочку из просьб..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

{n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

{n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

{n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

languages.text: {n}阿贝拉德强忍着不满的态度，在你耳边低声嘟囔着。{/n}“‘你要替我夺回欧夫拉茨二号星。’……咱们这位尊敬的大审判官现在甚至都懒得敷衍，就连请求一下的表面功夫都懒得做了……”
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿贝拉德强忍着不满的态度，在你耳边低声嘟囔着。{/n}“‘你要替我夺回欧夫拉茨二号星。’……咱们这位尊敬的审判长现在甚至都懒得敷衍，就连请求一下的表面功夫都懒得做了……”

languages.text: {n}Abelard logra callar un gruñido insatisfecho y murmura solo para tus oídos:{/n} «"Reconquistará Eufrates II para mí"... Parece que el estimado Lord Inquisidor ha decidido dejar a un lado las pretensiones y la cortesía. Ya ni se molesta en disfrazar sus órdenes de peticiones...».
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard logra callar un gruñido insatisfecho y murmura solo para tus oídos:{/n} «"Reconquistará Eufrates II para mí"... Parece que el estimado Lord Inquisidor ha decidido dejar a un lado las pretensiones y la cortesía. Ya ni se molesta en disfrazar sus órdenes de peticiones...».

languages.text: {n}アベラルドは不快感から漏れ出たうめきを押し殺し、あなたの耳にだけ聞こえるようにつぶやいた。{/n}「『自分の代わりにユーフラテス・IIを取り返せ』などと…敬愛すべきロード・インクィジターは、今やあらゆる口実も礼儀も捨て去ってしまわれたようです。彼の命令には、もはや依頼という上辺を取り繕うものすらありません…」
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

traits.locale_text: {n}アベラルドは不快感から漏れ出たうめきを押し殺し、あなたの耳にだけ聞こえるようにつぶやいた。{/n}「『自分の代わりにユーフラテス・IIを取り返せ』などと…敬愛すべきロード・インクィジターは、今やあらゆる口実も礼儀も捨て去ってしまわれたようです。彼の命令には、もはや依頼という上辺を取り繕うものすらありません…」

languages.text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un grognement désapprobateur et murmure de façon à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre :{/n} « "Vous allez reprendre Euphrate-II pour moi." Je vois que l'honorable seigneur inquisiteur a abandonné toute notion de politesse. Il ne fait même plus semblant de vous demander les choses... »
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abélard laisse échapper un grognement désapprobateur et murmure de façon à ce que vous {mf|seul|seule} puissiez l'entendre :{/n} « "Vous allez reprendre Euphrate-II pour moi." Je vois que l'honorable seigneur inquisiteur a abandonné toute notion de politesse. Il ne fait même plus semblant de vous demander les choses... »

languages.text: {n}Abelard schluckt ein verärgertes Grunzen herunter. Sein Murmeln ist gerade so laut, dass nur du es hören kannst:{/n} "'Ihr werdet Eufrates II für mich zurückerobern' ... Der geschätzte Großinquisitor macht sich nicht einmal mehr die Mühe, Höflichkeit vorzutäuschen. Seine Befehle sind nicht einmal mehr als Bitte getarnt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Abelard schluckt ein verärgertes Grunzen herunter. Sein Murmeln ist gerade so laut, dass nur du es hören kannst:{/n} "'Ihr werdet Eufrates II für mich zurückerobern' ... Der geschätzte Großinquisitor macht sich nicht einmal mehr die Mühe, Höflichkeit vorzutäuschen. Seine Befehle sind nicht einmal mehr als Bitte getarnt ..."

languages.text: {n}Abelard, memnuniyetsizlikle homurdanıyor. Sözlerine ancak senin duyabileceğin bir tonla başlıyor.{/n} "'Benim için Eufrates II'yi alacaksın.' diyor... Muhterem Lord Engizisyoncu, formaliteleri ve nezaketi de bir kenara bıraktı artık. Emirlerini kisvesiz vermeye başlamış..."
languages.original_text: {n}Abelard stifles a grunt of displeasure, his mutter pitched for your ears only:{/n} "'You will reconquer Eufrates II for me'... The esteemed Lord Inquisitor has done away with all pretence and politeness now. His orders no longer come with even the veneer of a request..."
